alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued June 26 at 5:07PM MST until June 26 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 615 PM MST. * At 507 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near South Mountain Park to near Olberg to near Coolidge, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 157 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 143 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 149. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Tempe, Avondale, Goodyear, Casa Grande, Coolidge, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Arizona City, La Palma, South Mountain Park, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg and Arizola. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
